snippet.title: My Father Lied - Gameplay Teaser Trailer - Lunar Games LTD
snippet.description:
“My Father Lied” is a first person point and click mystery adventure that tells the story of Huda, who finds herself following an unfathomable secret regarding her father’s 20 years disappearance.

The game is made entirely by using images, both 360 degree images and conventional 2D images, making it look graphically good on low spec devices.

*Official Website:
https://www.lunargames.co.uk/


*Discord:
https://discord.gg/VQV3GYV7


Twitter:
https://twitter.com/lunargamesUruk


*Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/lunargames.sumeria/


*TikTok:
https://www.tiktok.com/@lunargames.assyria
